snippet.title: Bloody Ink - OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Luca is a man who has lost his job. He lives day by day trying to survive. When a new job finally promises to change his life, his nightmare begins. Having to take care of a man who is completely burned, Luca moves into the man’s house where the terror becomes real.
While exploring the house, you will have the task of taking care of the burned man. Discover what caused the fire in which he lost his wife and how all of this is connected to Luca.

=== GAMES ===
➜ SCARY SHADOW SPOT - Last Farewell: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3096050/Last_Farewell
➜ BLOODY INK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2700240/Bloody_Ink/
➜ THE TELEPHONE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2488890/The_Telephone
➜ LOST ALONE ULTIMATE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341330/Lost_Alone_Ultimate/
➜ WHO KNOCKS: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2211640/Who_Knocks

=== SOCIAL ===
➜ INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/doesntmattergames/
➜ TWITTER: https://twitter.com/DDM_Games
➜ DISCORD: https://discord.gg/qESAr4KAVE
➜ WEB: https://www.doesntmattergames.com
